doc.previous: The manufacturing sector is closely connected with engineering and industrial design Examples of major manufacturers in North America include General Motors Corporation General Electric Procter Gamble General Dynamics Boeing Pfizer and Precision Castparts Examples in Europe include Volkswagen Group Siemens and Michelin Examples in Asia include Sany Huawei Lenovo Toyota Samsung and Bridgestone
